title: Special Guest!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Hello everyone! We’ve got a special guest for today’s stream. Our guest is.... this person!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukuku, I’ve kept you waiting, huh, my little demons. Yohane has descended!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>We got Yoshiko-chan to come over for today~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hey, Hanayo! It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ah, I’m sorry. We got Yohane-chan to come over!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Heh, now that Yohane is here, there’s no way this stream won’t be a blast. I’m sure everyone is shaking with joy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>As expected of Yohane-chan! So, today, I wanted to do this together with you! Ta-da!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh, Hanayo, is that.... a horror game....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah. You do a lot of gaming streams, right, Yoshiko-chan? I’m not really good with scary things, but I figured if I had the fallen angel Yohane-chan, then I won’t be scared. I’ll be counting on you, Yohane-chan♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>O-, of course.... You can count on me....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
